Plot: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.
Title: The Hills Have Eyes
Writer: Alexandre Aja (screenplay), Grégory Levasseur (screenplay), Wes Craven
Actors: Aaron Stanford, Kathleen Quinlan, Vinessa Shaw, Emilie de Ravin
tomatoConsensus: Faster paced for today's audiences, this Hills remake ratchets up the gore for the hardcore horror fans, but will turn away casual audiences.
